summary: This release brings Grove to life with smart, AI-generated release summaries that automatically populate your timeline, making it easier to track progress. We've polished the workshop with new floating icons and improved navigation, while also enhancing dark mode and accessibility across the platform. Under the hood, we've solidified our foundations with renames and fixes, setting the stage for a more intuitive and powerful experience.
